00034 #ifndef MULTI_GATHER_H
00035 #define MULTI_GATHER_H
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 #include <mpi.h>
00043 #include <vector>
00044 #include <iostream>
00045 #include "mpi_bindings.h"
00046 #include <algorithm>
00047 
00048 namespace cluster {
00049   
00062   template <class T>
00063   class multi_gather {
00065     struct buffer {
00066       int size;             
00067       char *buf;            
00068       std::vector<T> *dest; 
00069 
00071       buffer(std::vector<T>& _dest) 
00072         : size(0), buf(NULL), dest(&_dest) { }
00073 
00075       buffer(int _size) 
00076         : size(_size), buf(new char[_size]), dest(NULL) { }
00077 
00079       ~buffer() { 
00080         if (buf) delete [] buf; 
00081       }
00082 
00084       void set_destination(std::vector<T>& _dest) { dest = &_dest; }
00085 
00087       bool is_allocated() { return buf; }
00088 
00090       void allocate() { buf = new char[size]; }
00091 
00093       bool is_send()   { return !dest; }
00094     };
00095 
00096     MPI_Comm comm;                   
00097     int tag;                         
00098 
00099     std::vector<MPI_Request> reqs;   
00100     std::vector<buffer*> buffers;    
00101     size_t unfinished_reqs;          
00102     
00103   public:
00108     multi_gather(MPI_Comm _comm, int _tag=0) 
00109       : comm(_comm), tag(_tag), unfinished_reqs(0) { }
00110 
00114     template <class ObjIterator, class RankIterator>
00115     void start(ObjIterator  begin_obj, ObjIterator  end_obj, 
00116                RankIterator begin_src, RankIterator end_src, 
00117                std::vector<T>& dest, int root) 
00118     {
00119       int size, rank;
00120       CMPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00121       CMPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00122 
00123       // stop if this rank isn't a member of the gather.
00124       if (rank != root && find(begin_src, end_src, rank) == end_src) return;
00125 
00126       // determine size of local data.
00127       int packed_size = cmpi_packed_size(1, MPI_SIZE_T, comm);  // num objects
00128       for (ObjIterator o=begin_obj; o != end_obj; o++) {       // size of each object
00129         packed_size += o->packed_size(comm);
00130       }
00131 
00132       buffer *send_buffer = new buffer(packed_size);
00133       if (rank != root) {
00134         buffers.push_back(NULL);          // no separate buffer for the size.
00135         reqs.push_back(MPI_REQUEST_NULL);
00136         CMPI_Isend(&send_buffer->size, 1, MPI_INT, root, tag, comm, &reqs.back());
00137         unfinished_reqs++;
00138       }
00139 
00140       // pack up local data into the buffer
00141       int pos = 0;
00142       size_t num_objects = distance(begin_obj, end_obj);
00143       CMPI_Pack(&num_objects, 1, MPI_SIZE_T, send_buffer->buf, send_buffer->size, &pos, comm);
00144       for (ObjIterator o=begin_obj; o != end_obj; o++) {
00145         o->pack(send_buffer->buf, packed_size, &pos, comm);
00146       }
00147 
00148       if (rank != root) {
00149         // send packed data along to destination.
00150         buffers.push_back(send_buffer);     // buffer data during send
00151         reqs.push_back(MPI_REQUEST_NULL);
00152         CMPI_Isend(send_buffer->buf, packed_size, MPI_PACKED, root, tag, comm, &reqs.back());
00153         unfinished_reqs++;
00154 
00155       } else {        // rank is root; do receives instead
00156         // initiate all the receives for sizes
00157         for (RankIterator src=begin_src; src != end_src; src++) {
00158           if (*src == root) {
00159             // for the root, just insert the local packed buffer onto the array of buffers.
00160             // don't increment unfinished reqs here b/c local buffer is already "done."
00161             send_buffer->set_destination(dest);
00162             buffers.push_back(send_buffer);
00163             reqs.push_back(MPI_REQUEST_NULL);
00164 
00165           } else {
00166             // make some buffer space for the receive, record its eventual destination
00167             buffers.push_back(new buffer(dest));
00168             reqs.push_back(MPI_REQUEST_NULL);
00169             CMPI_Irecv(&buffers.back()->size, 1, MPI_INT, *src, tag, comm, &reqs.back());
00170             unfinished_reqs++;
00171           }
00172         }
00173       }
00174     }
00175 
00179     template <class RankIterator>
00180     void start(const T& obj, RankIterator begin_src, RankIterator end_src, std::vector<T>& dest, int root) {
00181       start(&obj, (&obj) + 1, begin_src, end_src, dest, root);
00182     }    
00183 
00184     void finish() {
00185       int rank;
00186       CMPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
00187 
00188       while (unfinished_reqs) {
00189         int outcount;
00190         std::vector<int> indices(reqs.size());
00191         std::vector<MPI_Status> status(reqs.size());
00192 
00193         CMPI_Waitsome(reqs.size(), &reqs[0], &outcount, &indices[0], &status[0]);
00194         for (int o=0; o < outcount; o++) {
00195           const int r = indices[o];   // index of received object.
00196 
00197           if (buffers[r] && !buffers[r]->is_send() && !buffers[r]->is_allocated()) {
00198             // buffers[r] is a recv and we just received packed size.  Allocate space and recv data.
00199             int src = status[o].MPI_SOURCE;
00200             buffers[r]->allocate();
00201             CMPI_Irecv(buffers[r]->buf, buffers[r]->size, MPI_PACKED, src, tag, comm, &reqs[r]);
00202 
00203           } else {
00204             // buffers[r] is a send, or it's a receive and we just received full packed data.
00205             // in either case, the buffer is done, so decrement the number of unfinished reqs.
00206             unfinished_reqs--;
00207           }
00208         }
00209       }
00210 
00211       // Unpack all the received buffers into their destination vectors.  This preserves order
00212       // as unpacked data are only pushed onto the backs of destination vectors *after* everything
00213       // is received.  Buffers are still received in any order above, though.
00214       for (size_t i=0; i < buffers.size(); i++) {
00215         if (!buffers[i]) continue;
00216 
00217         if (!buffers[i]->is_send()) {
00218           int pos = 0;
00219           size_t num_objects;
00220 
00221           CMPI_Unpack(buffers[i]->buf, buffers[i]->size, &pos, &num_objects, 1, MPI_SIZE_T, comm);
00222           for (size_t o=0; o < num_objects; o++) {
00223             buffers[i]->dest->push_back(T::unpack(buffers[i]->buf, buffers[i]->size, &pos, comm));
00224           }
00225         }
00226         delete buffers[i];
00227       }
00228             
00229       // clear these out before the next call to start()
00230       buffers.clear();
00231       reqs.clear();
00232     }
00233     
00234   }; // class multi_gather
00235   
00236 } // namespace cluster  
00237     
00238 
00239 #endif // MULTI_GATHER_H
